005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * Supports writing different types of items using a visitor pattern.
019 */
020public interface IItemWriter extends AutoCloseable {
021  /**
022   * Write the provided sequence instance.
023   *
024   * @param sequence
025   *          the instance to write
026   */
027  void writeSequence(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence);
028
029  /**
030   * Write the provided array item instance.
031   *
032   * @param array
033   *          the instance to write
034   */
035  void writeArray(@NonNull IArrayItem<?> array);
036
037  /**
038   * Write the provided map item instance.
039   *
040   * @param map
041   *          the instance to write
042   */
043  void writeMap(@NonNull IMapItem<?> map);
044
045  /**
046   * Write the provided node item instance.
047   *
048   * @param node
049   *          the instance to write
050   */
051  void writeNode(@NonNull INodeItem node);
052
053  /**
054   * Write the provided atomic item instance.
055   *
056   * @param item
057   *          the instance to write
058   */
059  void writeAtomicValue(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item);
060
061  /**
062   * Write the provided function item instance.
063   *
064   * @param function
065   *          the instance to write
066   */
067  void writeFunction(@NonNull IFunction function);
068}
